batch size.from sentence: We use a batch size of B = 32 , where for a batch of image - caption pairs each image ( caption ) is only related to one caption ( image ) .

? = 0.25.from sentence: We use D = 1024 for common space mapping dimension and ? = 0.25 for Leaky ReLU in the non-linear mappings .

Image - caption pairs.from sentence: Image - caption pairs are sampled randomly with a uniform distribution .

common space mapping weights.from sentence: Both visual and textual networks weights are fixed during training and only common space mapping weights are trainable .

network.from sentence: We train the network for 20 epochs with the Adam optimizer with lr = 0.001 where the learning rate is divided by 2 once at the 10 - th epoch and again at the 15 - th epoch .

weights.from sentence: We regularize weights of the mappings with l 2 regularization with reg value = 0.0005 .
